 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַסְמֵר‎</span>] **noun masculine**<sup>[[Eccl.12.11|Eccl 12:11]]</sup> ==nail== (connection with above √ dubious; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַסְמְרָא‎</span>, ChrPalAramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#Schw|Schw]]<sup>63. 122</sup>; Late Hebrew verb <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סמר‎</span> ***nail on*** or ***up***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> is perhaps loan-word [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>89</sup>); — plural absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַסְמְרִים‎</span> [[Isa.41.7|Isa 41:7]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִסְמְרִים‎</span> [[1Chr.22.3|1Chr 22:3]] (of iron; on <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ִ֯‎</span> see [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:85f»§ 85f</sup>.); also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַסְמְרוֺת‎</span> [[Jer.10.4|Jer 10:4]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַקָּבוֺת‎</span>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַשְׂמְרוֺת נְטוּעִים‎</span>, [[Eccl.12.11|Eccl 12:11]](simile; + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דָּרְבֹנוֺת‎</span>), and <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִסְמְרוֺת‎</span> [[2Chr.3.9|2Chr 3:9]] (of gold). 

 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַשְׂמֵר‎</span>], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַשְׂמְרוֺת‎</span>, [[Eccl.12.14|Eccl 12:14]], see [ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַסְמֵר‎</span>].
